comment: I love Spotify and use it almost everyday. Smart shuffle and recomended songs features seem to be taking over and are becoming very annoying. I am constantly having to restart a playlist to get it off smart shuffle or recommend songs. STOP TELLING ME WHAT TO DO
key sentence: Key words: Smart shuffle, recommended songs
the function of activity: The activity involves searching, library function, playing/pausing items, viewing downloaded songs/podcasts, downloading songs or podcasts, adding to playlists, shuffling a playlist, connecting to devices, previewing episodes, type replies to episodes and accessing history page, setting page
